ISSUE.TITLE: Cannot update membership tier descriptions
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary I can't seem to add/update the description for any membership tiers. Entering a description and then saving clears out whatever value was entered. The database also does not get the updated value either. https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13506/199175848-c10bb422-68ff-4622-86c2-1b9ece1ae716.mov I've tested this with fresh installs of Ghost both locally and on a DO droplet where I host several other Ghost instances. This functionality appears to be working fine on another instance of Ghost running v5.11 but not on the latest version at the time of this report v5.22.1. ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Install a new Ghost instance (v5.22.1) 2. Connect Ghost to Stripe account 3. Add a description to any membership tier 4. Description does not save and no error message is displayed ### Ghost Version 5.22.1 ### Node.js Version 14.17.0 ### How did you install Ghost?
